```{r, message = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
library(shiny)
library(plotly)
library(spData)


fire <- st_read("Fire_Output.shp")
rx_fire <- st_read(".", layer = "nonfire_rx_Output")
rx_nonfire <- st_read(".", layer = "nonfire_rx_Output")
county_pop <- read_csv("ca_county_pop.csv")

```

```{r}

vector_filepath = system.file("firePoints.gpkg", package = "spData")
fire_points = st_read(vector_filepath)
```




```{r}


fire_year <- fire %>% 
  select(YEAR_, FIRE_NAME, Shape_Area) %>% 
  filter(YEAR_ ==  "2000" | YEAR_ == "2001" | YEAR_ == "2002" | YEAR_ == "2003")
  


fire_year <- st_transform(fire_year, crs = 4326)

```


```{r}

top100 <- fire %>% 
  select(YEAR_, FIRE_NAME,Shape_Area, CAUSE) %>% 
  arrange(-Shape_Area)

top100 <- top100[1:100,]
```
